text: Landscape in the Mist (, translit. Topio stin omichli) is a 1988 Greek drama movie directed by Theo Angelopoulos. It stars Ilias Logothetis, Michalis Zeke, Tania Palaiologou, Stratos Tzortzoglou, Vassilis Kolovos and Michael Giannatos. ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 drama movies Category:1980s road movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Theo Angelopoulos Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies about siblings
title: Landscape in the Mist
